<noinclude>
This template outputs one or more styled tags. The color has been defined based on the tag name. Tags are case insensitive.
<pre>{{Item_tag|tag1=Heal|tag2=Lifesteal}}</pre>
Styled Tags:
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Heal|tag2=Lifesteal}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Build|tag2=Summon}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Block|tag2=Pass Through|tag3=Armor|tag4=Negates Piercing|tag5=Negates Crushing|tag6=Damage Mitigation|tag7=Invulnerable}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Phased|tag2=Teleport}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Movement Increase|tag2=Invisible|tag3=Steadfast|tag4=Stealthed|tag5=Cooldown Reduction|tag6=Reset On Kill}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Stun|tag2=Grab|tag3=Throw|tag4=Exhaust|tag5=Displacement|tag6=Slow|tag7=Root|tag8=Vulnerable|tag9=Knockback}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Crushing|tag2=Piercing|tag3=Exploding|tag4=Damage Over Time|tag5=Damage Reflect|tag6=Embed|tag7=Exploding}}</div>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Damage Increase}}</div>

Any tag that isn't a supported keyword will have a default styling and show the text written:
<pre>{{Item_tag|tag1=Every|tag2=OTHER|tag3=Tag}}</pre>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Every|tag2=OTHER|tag3=Tag}}</div>

Add ":lv3" to the end of a tag to add the level 3 icon:
<pre>{{Item_tag|tag1=Piercing|tag2=Stun|tag3=Reset On Kill:lv3}}</pre>
<div>{{Item_tag|tag1=Piercing|tag2=Stun|tag3=Reset On Kill:lv3}}</div>
</noinclude>
